    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener
      EventListener Interface for listening to question related events fired by a QuestionWindow component.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuestionWindow()
      Constructs a question window object for showing the question with the answer choices and submit- and next-button.

    • Method Detail

      • isInformative

        public boolean isInformative()
        Indicates whether answering the question should give any information about the question.
        Returns:
        true if answering the question gives any information about the question.

      • setInformative

        public void setInformative(boolean informative)
        Sets whether answering the question should give any information about the question.
        Parameters:
        informative - whether answering the question should give any information about the question.

      • isSkippingAllowed

        public boolean isSkippingAllowed()
        Indicates whether jumping back and forth between questions is allowed.
        Returns:
        true if jumping back and forth between questions is allowed.

      • setAllowSkipping

        public void setAllowSkipping(boolean allowSkipping)
        Sets whether jumping back and forth between questions is allowed.
        Parameters:
        allowSkipping - whether jumping back and forth between questions is allowed.

      • addQuestionEventListener

        public void addQuestionEventListener(String eventName,
                            QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener listener)
        Adds a new QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener listener into the QuestionWindow component.
        Parameters:
        eventName - The QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener event the listener will listen to.
        listener - The event listener object itself.

      • removeQuestionEventListener

        public void removeQuestionEventListener(String eventName,
                               QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener listener)
        Remove listener from a specific QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener event.
        Parameters:
        eventName - the name of the QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener event.
        listener - QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener Event listener to remove.

      • removeQuestionEventListener

        public void removeQuestionEventListener(QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener listener)
        Remove listener from all QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener events it is registered by. Convenient way of cleaning up an listener object being destroyed.
        Parameters:
        listener - QuestionWindow.QuestionEventListener Event listener to remove.

      • getQuestionLibrary

        public QuestionLibrary getQuestionLibrary()
        Returns the question library.
        Returns:
        the question library.

      • setQuestionLibrary

        public void setQuestionLibrary(QuestionLibrary questionLibrary)
        Sets the question library.
        Parameters:
        questionLibrary - the question library to set.

      • ask

        public boolean ask(int timeSlot)
        Asks all of the existing questions in the given time slot.
        Parameters:
        timeSlot - the time slot to ask.
        Returns:
        true if there are any unanswered questions in this time slot.

      • show

        public void show()
        Shows the dialog window in the UI.

      • hide

        public void hide()
        Hides the dialog window from the UI.
